chara.textHome: I guess I have what you'd call a big family...

There's my dad, my 3 little sisters,
and my 3 little brothers,
so 8 of us all live together.
It's pretty tough!

Mealtimes are like a battlefield,
and don't even get me started on
the amount of laundry!

But still, having everyone together
keeps every day exciting.
For me, family comes first!

The most important thing for
penny-pinching?
I'd say don't stress out.

Sure, it's true for everything,
but that's the only way to keep it going!
Isn't this great!

It looks like I've got enough points on
my card to buy something nice!
Well, how about that?!

Now if only the pay at my part time job
would go up like this, too...

I saw how hard my mom and dad worked,
so I naturally helped out around the house.

Just start by doing what you can
and go from there.

Mom, she taught me everything I know
about keeping a household going.

I learned by watching her at first,
and then she taught all sorts of little tricks.

I'll remember her lessons
for the rest of my life.
Now I've got to pass them on!
Hey, there you are! Thanks for coming!
Now, let's get to it...
Oh, no battles today.

I just need help with my part time job.
Please!
Morning! I just finished my paper route.
Phew, I'm wiped!
Still, gotta make breakfast though!

On weekdays I get the school lunch,
and I always ask the server to
give me a huge serving.

Otherwise, I wouldn't make it through
the afternoon!
My schedule's packed so I'm always busy.

There's housework, homework,
and not to mention Magical Girl work!

I'm off to bed now! I start early tomorrow,
plus we don't want to waste electricity!
You can't sleep?

No worries, just close your eyes
and you'll nod off eventually!

The school's okay with me doing
milk runs and paper routes.

But all my other jobs
have to be off the books.
Secret side hustles, ya know!

Every day feels like a fight to survive,
but I've made it this far...right?
But there's more trouble to come!
I have to stay fired up and keep going!
So basically I'll end up fighting myself?
Huh, sounds fun!

I can't even imagine having
a hundred million yen.
That's a hundred million 1 yen coins...
Nope, I can't imagine that, either!

Cutting costs is pretty fun
once you get going!

Scouting out the cheap stuff
is a bit like treasure hunting.

You need money to live,
but I use it on my family.

They're the most important thing
in the world to me.

I can't believe there are people
who don't like to carry coins
in their wallets!
I stuff mine 'til it's bursting!

I'm the oldest, so I have to keep my
little brothers and sisters out of trouble.

That's why I put all my effort into
playing games with them!

Magical Girl fights are rough, for sure,
but I also kind of feel like...they're a
good business opportunity.
Why? Just a gut feeling!

Whoa, I'm sensing a big opportunity
coming up!

Awesome!
You only need to strike it lucky
once to be set for life!
I'm sick of super rich people...

But if people have a little bit of wealth,
they're usually okay, I think?
Oh, am I missing the point?

Those who don't keep a penny
will never save many...
And those who do can appreciate its value!
Just a little saying I have!
Time is money! Let's make this quick!
One victory! Thank you, come again!
Easy as that!
I'm undefeatable!
I have to get back home!
My name's Himika Mao!

I know we just met,
but could you do me a favor?

Help me out with my newspaper route,
would you?
Once I'm done, I can help you fight!

This must be what it's like to get a raise!
Right?
Oh, it isn't? Ah, oh well!
Wh-whoaaa!
I'm not too shabby at this, am I?!
There, one step closer!
It's just like with making a sale.
What's important is how it all piles up, right?!

Buying in bulk is the first lesson in saving
money! Once you've bought your food,
NEVER spend any more on food after that!
That's the rule!
Then just repeat once the food runs out.

At our house, the lights stay on not a
second more than they have to be!
That's how to keep the electric bill down.

Water and gas are used at
the bare minimum, too!
